The 350,000 strong 'General Security and Central Security Forces' ( QuwwÄt al-
Amn al- Amm wa QuwwÄt al-Amn al-MarkazÄ«, often shortened to Al-Amn al-MarkazÄ«)
CSF organisation is an Egyptian paramilitary force which is responsible for
assisting the Egyptian National Police (ENP) for the security of governmental
fixed sites, foreign embassies & missions, riots & crowds control, publicly
crowded events, high risk arrests, disaster response and SWAT operations.
